## Installation

### Dependencies

To install ``LibMTL``, you need to setup the following libraries:

- Python >= 3.7
- PyTorch >= 1.8.0
- torchvision >= 0.9.0
- numpy >= 1.20

### User Installation

#### Using PyPi

The simplest way to install `LibMTL` is using `pip`.

```shell
pip install -U LibMTL
```

#### Using Source Code

If you prefer, you can clone the source code from the GitHub and run the setup.py file.

```shell
git clone https://github.com/median-research-group/LibMTL.git
cd LibMTL
python setup.py install
```
